de.tuberlin.pserver.crdt.counters

Class GCounter

  • Object
    • AbstractCRDT
      • AbstractCounter
        • GCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Counter, CRDT, Serializable

    public class GCounter
extends AbstractCounter
implements CRDT, Serializable
    An increment-only implementation of the Counter interface. Calling decrement() on a GCounter will cause an OpperationNotSupportedException.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Sole Constructor.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean decrement(int i)
      The decrement operation is not supported by the GCounter CRDT.
      boolean increment(int i)
      Increments the the overall count by i and broadcasts the operation to other replicas if necessary.
      protected boolean update(int srcNodeID, Operation op)
      Applies an Operation received from another replica to the local replica of a CRDT.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        protected boolean update(int srcNodeID,
                         Operation op)
        Applies an Operation received from another replica to the local replica of a CRDT. GCounter CRDTs only allow the INCREMENT operation. Any other operation causes an IllegalArgumentException.
        Specified by:
        update in class AbstractCRDT
        Parameters:
        srcNodeID - the ID of the node that broadcast the operation
        op - the operation to be applied locally
        Returns:
        true if the update changed the value of the count

      • increment

        public boolean increment(int i)
        Description copied from interface: Counter
        Increments the the overall count by i and broadcasts the operation to other replicas if necessary.
        Specified by:
        increment in interface Counter
        Parameters:
        i - the amount to be added to the count
        Returns:
        true if i was successfully added to the count

      • decrement

        public boolean decrement(int i)
                  throws UnsupportedOperationException
        The decrement operation is not supported by the GCounter CRDT. Calling this method causes an UnsupportedOperationException.
        Specified by:
        decrement in interface Counter
        Parameters:
        i - the amount to be subtracted from the count
        Returns:
        does not return
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if this method is called
